footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, composed of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a powerful brew that opens the doors to perception, allowing for deep emotional, mental, and spiritual healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical and energetic level, cleansing the body of toxins and freeing the mind from limiting patterns. During the ceremony, participants may experience visions, emotional releases, and profound spiritual insights, always guided in a safe and contained space.
spiritualMasterDescription: Known as the 'master plant,' Ayahuasca teaches us to see beyond the obvious, reconnect with our essence, and understand our purpose in life. It is a journey of self-knowledge and transformation that requires respect, intention, and courage.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps release emotional blockages, resolve internal conflicts, and find answers to deep questions, providing a renewed sense of peace and mental clarity.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The medicine purifies the body, strengthens the immune system, and revitalizes energy, promoting a state of complete well-being.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It facilitates a deep connection with your inner self, with others, and with the universe, expanding consciousness and revealing the interconnectedness of all things.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared experience where the collective energy enhances individual healing. It's an opportunity to connect with others on the same path.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies tailored to your specific needs and intentions.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn more about the history, components, and sacred use of Ayahuasca as a tool for transformation.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you with respect and wisdom on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find dietary and mental recommendations here.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our upcoming ceremonies, receive inspiring content, and connect with other seekers on the path of healing.
guidesPageSubtitle: Each of our guides brings a unique blend of ancestral wisdom, compassion, and experience to ensure a safe and profound journey for every participant.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for healing and transformation.
noUpcomingCeremonies: No upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Check back soon!

ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the 'Past Events' section.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will be hidden from public view but can be reactivated later.

errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you provide a phone number.

myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are assigned to. Review the details and prepare for your journey.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You have not been assigned to any ceremonies yet. Explore our events and get in touch to reserve your spot.

themeCustomizationDescription: Customize the look and feel of your application.
userManagementSubtitle: View users, manage roles, and send communications.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in your system.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailSubjectPlaceholder: A special announcement for our community
emailBodyPlaceholder:
Hello Everyone!

We have exciting news to share...
editProfileDescription: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Please sign in or create an account to access the preparation guide.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: Please sign in or create an account to view our ceremonies.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. We are excited to share this sacred space with you. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: A summary of the answers you provided in the medical questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted yet.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: These are the answers provided by the user.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants or anxiolytics?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'yes'.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Follow our complete guide to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for a deep and safe experience.
preparationProcessDescription: Understand the stages of your journey, from preparation to integration.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred ritual guided by experts to facilitate your inner connection.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your inner world to find clarity, healing, and release.
integrationProcessDescription: Tools and support to incorporate the lessons learned into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, we recommend a clean and light diet.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables, whole grains (rice, quinoa), legumes, lean meats (chicken, fish), plenty of water.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat, pork, fermented foods, spicy or very salty foods, dairy, sugar, and caffeine.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Cultivate a state of peace and openness to receive the medicine.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on your intentions. What are you looking for? What do you want to heal?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca is a powerful tool for emotional release. It allows you to access deep parts of your subconscious to heal old wounds, release traumas, and find a state of inner peace and acceptance. It is a path to self-love and reconciliation with your own story.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure a comfortable and focused experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, loose-fitting clothing (preferably light colors), a blanket or sleeping bag, a pillow or cushion, a bottle of water.
essentialsList: A notebook and pen to jot down your reflections, a flashlight (with red light if possible), personal hygiene items.
systemLogsDescription: A list of errors captured by the system.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide bot.
allConversationsDescription: A log of every interaction users have had.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome. I am the spiritual guide of 'El Arte de Sanar'. How can I help you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
exportDataDescription: Download a full backup of your Firestore data as a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action is destructive. It will overwrite all current data in the database with the data from the selected file. This cannot be undone.
importSuccessDescription: Data has been restored from the backup file.
rollbackCardDescription: A backup of the data was automatically created before the last import. You can use it to undo the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the database to the state it was in before your last import. Are you sure you want to proceed?
rollbackSuccessDescription: The database has been restored to its previous state.

newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/artedesanar
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/artedesanar
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}}.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user should be assigned to.
